vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Job.32.2;
father of: Elihu (H0453K)
§ Barachel = "God blesses"
father of Elihu
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Elihú, amigo de Job
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴拉迦 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神祝福"
以利戶的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴拉迦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神祝福"
以利户的父亲
